content:
Adding sautéed chicken and spinach to the wild mushroom sauce will definitely elevate the dish and make it more substantial. The chicken will add protein and texture, while the spinach will add a boost of nutrients and flavor. And let's not forget the roasted bell peppers on top - they'll add a sweet, crunchy texture and a pop of color to the dish.

Here's a revised recipe you can follow:

**Wild Mushroom Sauce with Pappardelle, Chicken, Spinach, and Roasted Bell Peppers**

Ingredients:

* 1 lb mixed wild mushrooms (cremini, shiitake, oyster)
* 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces
* 2 cups fresh spinach leaves
* 2 bell peppers, any color, seeded and sliced
* 2 tablespoons olive oil
* 1 small onion, finely chopped
* 2 cloves garlic, minced
* 1 cup heavy cream
* 1 teaspoon dried thyme
* Salt and pepper, to taste
* 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
* Fresh parsley, chopped (optional)

Instructions:

1. Roast the bell peppers in the oven until charred and blistered. Peel off the skin, remove the seeds, and slice into strips.
2. Cook the pappardelle according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
3. In a large skillet, sauté the chicken in olive oil until cooked through. Remove from heat and set aside.
4. In the same skillet, add more olive oil if needed, then sauté the onion and garlic until softened. Add the mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and start to brown.
5. Add the thyme, salt, and pepper to the skillet, then stir in the heavy cream. Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook until the sauce has thickened slightly.
6. Stir in the cooked chicken, spinach, and roasted bell peppers. Cook until the spinach has wilted.
7. Add the cooked pappardelle to the skillet, tossing everything together until the pasta is well coated with the sauce.
8. Serve hot, topped with grated Parmesan cheese and chopped parsley if desired.

This dish is sure to be a hit! The combination of wild mushrooms, chicken, spinach, and roasted bell peppers will provide a hearty, flavorful meal that's perfect for a special occasion or a cozy night in.

I hope you enjoy your delicious wild mushroom sauce with pappardelle, chicken, spinach, and roasted bell peppers!
